title: Game screen freezes and unable to Alt-Tab out
body:
â€‹I have experienced this game-breaking issue several times over the past six months or so, including today.  During the game, everything on the screen froze except for the cursor.  I was unable to Alt-Tab out of the game or Ctrl-Alt-Delete to bring up the Task Manager.  The Task Manager did launch, but when I tried to Alt-Tab and select it the screen stayed on the frozen game.  I had to force League to close by signing out of my computer user account, then sign back in to my computer and League accounts and re-load into the game.

replies.body: Hmmm it really sounds like something is causing League to hard lock-up with the only option being to force close it. I'd try running a quick repair first to make sure it's not the game files causing the problem, then I'd consider trying a clean boot to see if background programs might be causing the freezes.

I'm doing a full client repair now.  I believe I've run a repair in the past.  This happens once in about 20-40 games.  I don't reboot my computer very often, so it could be background programs causing it.
This has been happening to me for about a year now, across multiple computers and component changes. Its sooo annoying. Haven't found a fix yet.
